scripts.start: npm run watch:all & npm run live-server
scripts.watch:ts: rm -rf js & mkdir js & touch js/index.js js/bundle.js & tsc -w & watchify js/index.js -o js/bundle.js
scripts.watch:all: npm run watch:ts & npm run watch:scss
scripts.build: sass --no-source-map scss/styles.scss:css/bundle.css & tsc & npm run browserify
scripts.dist-prep: rm -rf dist & mkdir dist dist/js dist/css & cp index.html dist/index.html & cp css/bundle.css dist/css/bundle.css & cp js/bundle.js dist/js/bundle.js & mkdir dist/static & cp static/favicon.ico dist/static/favicon.ico
scripts.build-artifacts: npm run build & npm run dist-prep & npm run cleanup
